sql-select.name: GetListOfProceduresWithSPName
sql-select.description: Finds all stored procedures with a naming convention beginning with SP_
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT db_name() AS [DatabaseName] ,tSU.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[xtype] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[crdate] AS [ObjectCreateDate] FROM [dbo].[sysobjects] tSO INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysusers] tSU ON tSU.[uid] = tSO.[uid] WHERE tSO.[xtype] = N'P' AND tSO.[name] LIKE 'sp[_]%' AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 ORDER BY tSU.[name] ,tSO.[name] ;

SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT db_name() AS [DatabaseName] ,tSS.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[type_desc] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[create_date] AS [ObjectCreateDate] FROM [sys].[objects] tSO INNER JOIN [sys].[schemas] tSS ON tSS.[schema_id] = tSO.[schema_id] WHERE tSO.[type_desc] = N'SQL_STORED_PROCEDURE' AND tSO.[name] LIKE 'sp[_]%' AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[object_id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 ORDER BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ;
